long_description: The wireless Outdoor Tech Buckshot Portable Speaker sports a shockproof, dust-proof and water-resistant exterior, along with a built-in speaker phone and microphone for multifunctional use. Bluetooth(R) wirelessly streams audio up to 32 ft. from your smartphone or other device, and when you have that important call to take, use the integrated microphone. Rechargeable lithium-ion battery gives you up to 16 hours of play time. Included silicone bicycle mount attaches the speaker to your bicycle handlebar or anything else with a similar profile. IPX5 resistance to dust and water. The Outdoor Tech Buckshot Portable Speaker comes with a USB charging cable, handlebar mount, stickers and user manual.
short_description: The wireless Outdoor Tech Buckshot Portable Speaker sports a shockproof, dust-proof and water-resistant exterior, along with a built-in speaker phone and microphone for multifunctional use.
